description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，现任中国人民解放军北部战区司令员。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army (PLA), currently serving as the commander of the Northern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江苏省下辖的县级市，是黄铭的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city in Jiangsu Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Huang Ming.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高军衔。
description.en: The highest rank in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾存在的七个大军区之一，2016年已撤销。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army, abolished in 2016.

description.en: One of the group armies of the PLA Ground Force, formed by the reorganization of the former 16th Group Army and other units.

description.en: One of the group armies of the PLA Ground Force, formed by the reorganization of the former 41st Group Army and other units.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的地面作战部队。
description.en: The land-based service branch of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的最高参谋机关。
description.en: The highest staff body of the PLA Ground Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军北部战区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北部战区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的五大战区之一。
description.en: One of the five theater commands of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将。曾任北部战区司令员，现任中部战区司令员。
description.en: A general of the PLA Air Force. Formerly served as the commander of the Northern Theater Command, currently serving as the commander of the Central Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军中将，曾任中部战区司令员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA Ground Force who formerly served as the commander of the Central Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，曾任陆军参谋长。
description.en: A general of the PLA Ground Force who formerly served as the Chief of Staff of the PLA Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军中将，现任陆军参谋长。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA Ground Force, currently serving as the Chief of Staff of the PLA Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军中将，曾任陆军第八十一集团军军长。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA Ground Force who formerly served as the commander of the 81st Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，曾任陆军第四十一集团军军长。
description.en: A general of the PLA Ground Force who formerly served as the commander of the 41st Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军少将，曾任陆军第十六集团军参谋长。
description.en: A major general of the PLA Ground Force who formerly served as the Chief of Staff of the 16th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军中将，曾任陆军第十六集团军参谋长。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA Ground Force who formerly served as the Chief of Staff of the 16th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 黄铭出生于江苏宜兴。
description.en: Huang Ming was born in Yixing, Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 黄铭是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Huang Ming is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 黄铭于2023年1月晋升上将军衔。
description.en: Huang Ming was promoted to the rank of general in January 2023.

中国人民解放军陆军第七十八集团军

description.zh-cn: 在改编前担任中国人民解放军陆军第十六集团军参谋长。
description.en: Served as the Chief of Staff of the PLA 16th Group Army before its reorganization.

relationships.target: 纪念中国人民抗日战争暨世界反法西斯战争胜利70周年大会

description.zh-cn: 作为将军领队之一，率领“平型关大战突击连”英模部队方阵参加阅兵式。
description.en: As one of the general leaders, he led the 'Pingxingguan Battle Assault Company' model unit formation in the military parade.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十五集团军

description.zh-cn: 在改编前担任中国人民解放军陆军第四十一集团军军长。
description.en: Served as the Commander of the PLA 41st Group Army before its reorganization.

description.zh-cn: 黄铭接替王强出任中国人民解放军北部战区司令员。
description.en: Huang Ming succeeded Wang Qiang as the commander of the PLA Northern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 黄铭接替吴亚男出任中国人民解放军中部战区司令员。
description.en: Huang Ming succeeded Wu Yanan as the commander of the PLA Central Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 王强接替黄铭出任中国人民解放军中部战区司令员。
description.en: Wang Qiang succeeded Huang Ming as the commander of the PLA Central Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 黄铭接替刘振立出任中国人民解放军陆军参谋长。
description.en: Huang Ming succeeded Liu Zhenli as the Chief of Staff of the PLA Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 李中林接替黄铭出任中国人民解放军陆军参谋长。
description.en: Li Zhonglin succeeded Huang Ming as the Chief of Staff of the PLA Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 吴爱民接替黄铭出任中国人民解放军陆军第八十一集团军军长。
description.en: Wu Aimin succeeded Huang Ming as the commander of the PLA 81st Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 黄铭接替李桥铭出任中国人民解放军陆军第四十一集团军军长。
description.en: Huang Ming succeeded Li Qiaoming as the commander of the PLA 41st Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 黄铭接替张学锋出任中国人民解放军陆军第十六集团军参谋长。
description.en: Huang Ming succeeded Zhang Xuefeng as the Chief of Staff of the PLA 16th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 丁来富接替黄铭出任中国人民解放军陆军第十六集团军参谋长。
description.en: Ding Laifu succeeded Huang Ming as the Chief of Staff of the PLA 16th Group Army.
